mapper.select: SELECT gr.id AS groupId, gr.gname AS groupName, gr.btm, gr.etm, gr.status, pmb.m_id AS marketId, pmb.m_name AS marketName, pmb.min_pkgs, pmb.min_weight, pmb.max_weight, pmb.base_price, pmb.base_weight, pmb.group_limit, gu.user_id FROM groupx gr JOIN pro_market_base pmb ON gr.market_id = pmb.m_id JOIN group_user gu ON gr.id = gu.group_id WHERE gr.id = #{groupId}
mapper.update: UPDATE groupx a SET a.status=2, a.real_etm=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE a.status!=2 AND a.etm < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `groupx` (`market_id`,`gname`,`btm`,`etm`,`status`) SELECT a.`market_id`,CONCAT(a.gname,a.dateSeri,a.flowId), a.`btm`,a.etm,a.status FROM ( SELECT a.`m_id` AS `market_id`, a.`m_name` AS `gname`, DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '%m%d') AS dateSeri, ( SELECT LPAD(COUNT(*)+1,3,0) FROM groupx xx WHERE 1=1 AND xx.btm >=CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '%Y-%m-%d'),' 00:00:00') AND xx.btm < CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d'),' 00:00:00') AND xx.`market_id`= a.`m_id` ) AS flowId ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS `btm` ,DATE_ADD(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, INTERVAL a.group_duration MINUTE) AS `etm`,1 AS `status` FROM pro_market_base a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM groupx b WHERE b.`status`!=2 ) b ON a.`m_id`=b.`market_id` WHERE (b.`etm` < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP OR b.`market_id` IS NULL) ) a
